title: Wizard Cromperty

properties.name: description
properties.value: Wizard Cromperty, located in north-east Ardougne, can teleport you to the Rune essence mine. This is a requirement for the Easy Ardougne Diary. He is also involved with the Tribal Totem, One Small Favour and King's Ransom quests. He has a slight problem with the Postal service.

SMW Subobject for After DiaryNPC location: East ArdougneUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 8481Examine: The hat is a dead give away.Release date: 20 September 2018Image: File:Wizard Cromperty.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Wizard Cromperty

Wizard Cromperty, located in north-east Ardougne, can teleport you to the Rune essence mine. This is a requirement for the Easy Ardougne Diary. He is also involved with the Tribal Totem, One Small Favour and King's Ransom quests. He has a slight problem with the Postal service.

After completion of the Ardougne medium achievement diary he will give you 100 pure essence for free every day, 150 upon completion of the hard tasks, and 250 upon completion of the elite tasks.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Wizard Cromperty is the solution to the master cryptic clue: A chisel and hammer reside in his home, strange for one of magic. Impress him with your magical equipment. Wear equipment adding up to at least 100 magic attack bonus when talking to him.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Transcripts Wizard Cromperty speaks in:
  • Transcript of Tribal Totem

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2016
(update)

Wizard Cromperty now knows you have space for his free daily pure essence if you already have a stack of noted pure essence on you.

5 March 2015
(update | poll)

Wizard Cromperty now gives free Pure essence once per day for the completion of Ardougne Diaries:

  • 100 essence for the medium diary.
  • 150 essence for the hard diary.
  • 250 essence for the elite diary.
